page.title: 20MY LIFE BY CLAIRE WALLER
page.content: In my life I like to play with my friends and watch TV. On Monday I go to school and I do recorder lessons with Mrs. Coslett. We go home at quarter past three and I play with Joanna Clark next door and we go over to the pond and to the church yard and I play in my room and I play football with my brother sometimes. On Tuesday I have games and I go to Brownies on Tuesday at half past six and we go home at 7.3O pm. On Wednesday we go swimming and if it's sunny I go in the garden and play with my brother sometimes. On Thursday Father Floate comes and we sing songs and do games or country dancing. Claire Waller, Flyford Flavell, 8 years old. July 1985.
